description: The file defines a Dashboard page/component for a React-based web application, displaying KPIs, cost charts, top recommendations, and a real-time activity stream, fetching data from various API endpoints.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the dashboard view with KPIs, charts, recommendations, and live updates.

methods.name: formatInteger
methods.description: Formats a number as a locale-specific integer string.

methods.name: formatCurrency
methods.description: Formats a number as a locale-specific currency string.
